const navStyle = ({ isActive }) => ({ color: isActive ? '#2ECC71' : '#E5E7EB', fontWeight: 600, textDecoration: 'none', padding: '0.7rem 1rem', borderRadius: '0.5rem', background: isActive ? '#181A20' : 'none' }); const Sidebar = ({ onLogout, isPlanExpired }) => (
User
Home Account Settings Help & Support Subscription My Purchases Notifications Activity Billing History Rewards Settings {isPlanExpired && Expired} Logout
); export default Sidebar;
